headline: Revisiting the Case Against R. Kelly
abstract: A new Lifetime series examines the criminal charges against the singer, and how accusing him changed the lives of the women who came forward.
lead_paragraph: Last year, for R. Kelly and the women he is accused of abusing, everything changed — and the Lifetime documentary series “Surviving R. Kelly” was a big reason.
keywords: Surviving R Kelly Part II: The Reckoning (TV Program)
